About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

I am a web developer with a background in project management. I have always been fascinated by software development. This curiosity led me to learn more about programming and the science and art behind websites and apps. I enjoy learning new things, and as a developer, I believe it is essential to be a life-long learner.

Graduated Web Development Bootcamp

I graduated from Lighthouse Labs, a web development Bootcamp. During this time, I learned about current coding technologies, including JavaScript(ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, React JS, Node JS, Express, Ruby, SQL, Mocha & Chai, Jest, and Cypress. I also engaged in several projects. Since then, I have continued learning TypeScript, Data Structure, Algorithms, etc.

Project Management Professional (PMP)
Professional Scrum Master (PSM)

As a PMP, I have extensive knowledge of Waterfall and Agile project management methods, along with a decade of field experience engaged in countries in Europe, North America, and Asia. Recently, I obtained a Professional Scrum Master certificate to specialize in software development processes and environments.

Having worked with multi-cultural and cross-functional teams throughout my career, I have developed a wide range of skills, including; communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills, which together make me a great addition to any team.
